name: Escape Haunted Castle - Amiga
description:
Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

Escape Haunted Castle

(Source code AmiBlitz3 included, why not modify it to your own game)

EVERYTHING MAY CHANGE STILL EARLY DAYS !!!

A stranger offers you a deal, if you win you will receive $1.000.000 in cash, lose you die! Your task is to collect notes, when you have all notes they form a password for exit door. You have 1 Hour ..   Do you accept the bet ?  

Game is in development !!!

Game looks/behaves 3D, there is no 3D engine ;) 

Jumpscare/survival Horror 

Control: WS for movement, AD rotate, E action

Requirements:  Only tested on emulated Amiga

AmigaOS 3.x, RTG 640x360x16, AHI, 68040/060

This is my second game done with Amiblitz3, Don't expect a supergame
